div.head: Hed curt
Hed court
div.p:
Curia Capitalis Balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
duodecimo die mensis Aprilis Anno Dominj millesimo Quingentesimo septimo
Quo die Sectis vocatis et Curia affirmata absentes patent

Thomas Watsone
Thomas Dauisone
Alexander leitht
Duncanus Andersone
Robertus Dauysone
Willelmus richerdsone
Thomas laisk
Walterus lang
Andreas baxter in Newburgh'
Richardus Watsone
Thomas Watsone in garllis
Johannes mar in Dys'
Thomas Wodman
Johannes Wilysone in Cromar
Andreas Watsone in Cullan
Matheus reid
Andreas brabnar
Symon' michel
Alexander buk

Eodem die accedens ad barram Religiosus vir frater Johannis Arnot minister
domus Sancte trinitatis burgi de Abirdene et protestabatur in forma Juris
pro vno annuo redditu sex solidorum et octo denariorum vsualis monete Scocie sibi
annuatim debito de quadam terra vasta quondam thome Cullan Jacente in le gastraw
inter terram Alexander malisone ex boreali ex vna Et terram quondam
dominum Andree gray capellani ex australi partibus ab altera et communionem viam re
giam versus oriens Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile
preter terram et lapides quos Balliuis in Sacculo presentauit in Curia tanquam
tercio die huius processus Testibus Symon michell Alexandro ramsay et
Andrea nachty sergeando

Eodem die accedens ad barram famosus vir Andreas lousone burgensis dicti
burgi et pretestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu Duarum marcarum
monete scocie sibi debito de quadam terra vasta Interiore Johannis Watsone Jacente
in vico casti dictj burgi ex boreali parte eiusdem vici inter terras thome lesly
et Andree mortimer ex occidentali ex vna et terram heredum quondam Willelmi
buchane ex orientali Et terram anteriorem ipsius Johannis malisone ex australi
in defectu solucionis dictj annuj redditus Ad quam terram accedens nichil
reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos balliuis in Sacculo presentauit
in Curia tanquam Tercio die huius processus Testibus Andrea hawe Johanne
Colly et Johanne Cuk sergeando

Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir magister Johannes marscheall capellanus
perpetuus altaris Sanctj ninianj confessoris situati infra ecclesiam parrochialem sanctj
nicholaij de abirdene et protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu sex
solidorum et octo denariorum vsualis monete scocie sibi et dicto altarj annuatim
debito et a longo tempore non soluto de quadam terra vasta Jacente infra dictum burgum
in vico viridi apud locum fratrm carmelitarum dictj burgj ex boreali parte eiusdem
vici inter terram Johannis Durward ex boreali et communiones vias regias versus
austrum et occidens Et communionem venellam versus oriens Ad quam terram accedens
nichil reperit distringibile terram et lapides quos balliuis in Sacculo presentauit
in Curia tanquam tercio die huius processus Testibus Symon michell Alexandro
ramsay et Andrea nachtj sergeando

Eodem die Accedens ad barram discretus vir dominus Dauid Walcar capella
nus perpetuus altaris beati leonardi in ecclesia perrochiali dicti burgj fundata
per quondam bone memorie Dauid Symsone et protestatus fuit in forma Juris
pro vno annuo redditu xxvj s' et viij d' monete Scocie sibi et dicte capella
nie sue debito a longo tempore et non soluto de quadam terra vasta Jacente infra
dictum burgum in le gastraw ex occidentali parte eiusdem vici inter terram
quondam dominum Andree gray ex australi ex vna et teram quondam Simonj
Clat ex boreali partibus ab altera Et communionem viam regiam versus oriens Et
accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos balliuis in
sacculo presentauit in Curia tanquam primo die huius processus Testibus Willelmo
mathousone Dauid couper et Willelmo scrimgeor sergeando

Eodem die tribus deductis et perlectis per discretum virum magistrum
Dauid menyeis nomine et ex parte capellanorum collegij beati nicholaij dicti burgi de
et super recuperacione proprietatis et possessionis cuiusdam terre vaste Jacente infra
dictum burgum in vico superiore ecclesie viri pertinenciis martino Kemp inter terram
Rogeri Wyrrecarle ex australi et terram thome gledstane ex boreali Et
communionem viam regiam versus occidens in defectu solucionis vnius annuj red
ditus quinque solidorum dictis capellanis a longo tempore debito et non soluto
vnde dictus magister Dauid pecijt a balliuis dicti burgj sibi fieri de dicta
terra Juris et Justicie complementum secundum tenorem suj processus precedens
Et consequenter dominus Dauid lyell prelocutor dicti magistri Dauid porrexit
plegium In manibus Willelmum scrimgeour sergeandi quod ipse magister Dauid
proprietatem et possessionem dicte terre cum pertinenciis legittime recuperauit
In defectu solucionis dictj annuj Redditus Vnde hora diei legittime expec
tata omnibus Interesse habenti vocato et nullo comparenti nec opponenti decretum
fuit per Curiam et datum pro Judicio per os Alexandri Joffrasoun' Judicatoris
Curie quod ipse magister Dauid causam suam obtinuit in recuperacione proprieta
tis dicte terre cum pertinenciis Super quibus dictus dominus Dauid nomine pre
locutorio dicti magistri Dauid pecijt Instrumentum Testibus Andrea Cullane
preposito Thoma Chamer Duncano collisone thoma leslie Johanne collison'
thoma Waus Roberto Waus Willelmo still et Duncano fyff

The said day It was statut and ordanit be the Alderman baillies and
Counsaill present for the tyme that na maner of officiar sergeand or mair
proclamand' breuis to the burrow court or serreff court tak vppoun' hand
to proclame ony breuez' without the officiar p that proclamis the samyn'
haue ane propir Signet or Seill with his naim and surnaim to giddir with
his merk or Armes And that nane proclame breues without thai haue the
samyn'

The said day Johnne litstar eldar denyit the borgh' fundin one
him be Johnne of cullan' for the wranguis' occupacioun' of ane forland'
hous' pertening to the said Johnne of cullane quhilk hous' mastir Johne
marscheall procurator for the said Johnne tuk him to preif this day viij
dais that the said Johnne litster occupeit wranguisly the said' forland'

The said day the Actioun' debatabile betuix Duncan collisone and Johnne
auchneif was continewit with consent of partie to friday that nixt cummys

The said day the ballies assignit friday that nixt cummys to Johnne
collisoun' to preive the maser his quhilk Johnne auchneyve has
And the said Johnne auchneif to preyf quhat the said maser aw him
And' the said Johnne auchneiff to bring the said maser the said day

The said day Will huntar grantit him to find ane Sufficient
man to mak seruice in Duncan collisounis bait fra the Rud day to
michelmes and to find' Souerte for the samyn or he passit vteutht
the tolbutht

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem decimo sexto die
mensis aprilis Anno quo supra

The said' day Johne auchneiwe grauntit that he hed' ane maser quhilkis was
Jhone' colisonis faderis

The saide Duncan colyson allegit that Johne auchneiwe held' magis auchnewe
his sistir in persone quhill scho maid' ane pretendit gift of hir' belt to
his douchtir and protestit quhat euire the witnes producit be the said' Johne
tharuntill suld' nocht turne the said' magis to nay preiudice And' the balyeis
assignit monunday that next Cumis to the said' Duncan to preiwe his said'
allegeance as the first day

The said' day the balyeis assignit this day xv dais to Johne auchneiwe
tile ansuer to the borghe' fundin one him be Johne Colisone for the wrang
wis' withaldin fra him of ane maser

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xix die mensis aprilis
Anno quo supra

The said day seruand to Johne litstar was conuict
be ane suorne assis' for the bryning of tua par' of Schetis pertening to sere
Johne ruthirfurd' knicht for the quhilkis scho was in ane amerciament of the court et cetera and tile
amend' to the partj as law wile and forber' in tyme to Cum

The said' day Alexander prat was conuict be ane Suorne assis' for barrelling
of talche and selling of It to fremmit men' vteuthe the Realme for the quhilkis
he was in ane Amerciament of the Court and tile amend' as law wile and forber in
tyme to cum

The said day Alexander prat Robert flessour Williame Rabvrne Johne
raburne Syme flessour Dauid Waus Williame Andirsone Robert futhes
flessouris was accusit for the want of flesche to furnys' the toune for
Selling of flesche derrar thane It was availe in Regrating on' the kingis
liegis quhilkis thai denyit and In continent thareftir It was put to the decisioun'
of ane assis' quhilkis riplie auisit fand' and deliuerit that thai coud' nocht
acquit the said' flessouris nay thai hed' falyeit in the furnysing of the
tone with flesche and In selling derrar thane thai suld' do for the quhilkis
Ilkan of thame was in Ane amerciament of the court et cetera to amend' as
law wile and forbeir' in tyme to Cum

The said' day the balyeis assignit this day xv dais to the flessouris to
ansuer to the toune for bying of lammys vteuthe the toune or thai
preusit the mercat

The said' day Williame Wormet come Souerte be his hand to the balyeis
in the nayme of Androw mar' tile vndirlie the law in ale thingis that thome
Ridale has to day to him as procurator for robert caus' and Come
dettour to pay ale that he mae preiwe aving to him

The said' day Norman leslie officiar at commavnd of the balye chargit gilbert
talyour to Remane within the tolbutht quhile he freid' William serray litstar
of iiij s' anent Johne meldrum sclatar and quhile he pait x s' for his
fredome

The said day Johnne litstar deponit be his aitht that he set his elding
and' stabillit his hors' in Johnne cullannis forland'

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
xx die mensis aprilis Anno quo supra

The saide day Copin hile exponit and schewe that patry leslie occupeit ane croft
pertening to him without tak or assedacioun' herfor he offerit him redy to pay
to the said' patry Samekile as he hed' deliuerit to patry ros' and ale Costis
maid' be him one the saide croft protestand' that he mycht haue regres' to his
said' croft

The said' day the balyeis assignit friday that next cumis to Dauid Kintor
tile ansuer' to the borghe' fundin one him be James Colisone for the wrang
uys' occupeing and fischeing of ane Sext part of ane nethis fyschingis
of Done quhilkis pertenis to him for this Instant yer' without tak or asse
dacioun'

Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxiij die mensis
Aprilis anno quo supra

The said' day Johnne colisone and thomas Waus bailyes grantit to pay to
patry reid' thar part of ane french crovne that is to say Ilkan of tham thre s'
vj d'

The said day the bailyes assignit this day xv dais to patry lesly to ansueir
to the borgh' fundin one him be copin hill for the wranguis' occupacioun' lauboring'
and manuring of ane croft pertenyng to him withtout tak or assedacioun' of him
And' offerit him reddy that quhat money gold or siluer that patry leslie hed'
gevin apoun' the said croft of formaill or ony vthiris to pay the samyn inconti
nent and' he to haue regres' to his said croft agan' And the said patry has put out his
pleuch' befors' and' his seruandis at his avin hand' out of the said croft without
ordour of lawe and' wrangit in the doing of It

The said' day Johne fendour' Oblist him to mak the greis of
the stallis of Sanct nicholes queir' to the prouest and Counsale for the
quhilkis thai grauntit to pay to him fiwe lib' scottis money

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxiiij
die mensis aprilis anno Dominj Millesimo quingentesimo septimo

The said' day Robert robertsone denyit that he hed' sellit ony clatht
within this burghe' to ony alieanr' of fremmyt men' Ande grantit that
he sald' Remoiwe and pas' out of the towne with his clatht

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta' in pretorio eiusdem xxvijo
die mensis aprilis Anno quo supra

The said' day Jonhne arthour' was conuict be ane suorne assis' Jamis
Colisone forspekar for the wranguis' castyne done of ane pece of ane dravcht
pertening to Williame Wormet for the quhilkis he was in ane amerciament of the
Court and tile amend' as law wile and forbeir' in tyme to Cum

The said' day Williame Wormet was conuict' be ane Suorne assis' James
Colisone forspekar for the wranguis' Cutting of ane pece of ane end' of
ane tre of the Ruf of Jonhne arthouris stabile quhilk hang our' the
said' Williamis yarde dyk for the quhilkis he was in ane amerciament of the
Court and tile amend' as law wile and forber' in tyme to Cum

The said' day Williame Wormet allegit him and his predecessoris possessoris of the pece
of land' quher' of Johne arthour' askit lying' betuix thame this hundretht yeris bigan
peciablie vndemavndit Ande that the aldirman and balyeis hed' entires' tharwitht to gere
lyne the said' land' without ane speciale charge of the kingis protestand' gif thai did'
ony thing in the Contrar' it suld' nocht turne him to na preiudice his heritage nor ayris

The said' day It was fundin and deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' James Colisone forspekar
that Alexander ramsay Cordonare sale pay to Androw edindeuche xxxiij s' and iiij d' for
Certane hydis bocht ande resauit fra him Obefor quhilkis the balyeis chargit him
to pay within terme of lawe

Curia Balliuorum burgj de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem vltimo die mensis
Aprilis ano quo supra et cetera

The said day the alderman and' balyes assignit monunday the tend' day of the
monetht of maij nixt tocum to g robert guthre of lovnan to giw him ansuer
of our Souerance lordis lettres directit to thame anent Isabell buchance douchtir
and' ayr to vmquhill William buchane burges of the said burgh'

The said day the balyeis assignit this dya viij dais the vij day of maij
nixt to cum to patry lesly one that ane part and gilbert prestone one that
vthir part to compeir befor thame bringand' withe thame thar richtis and
evidencis quhilkis thai haue and' will vis' anent ane yard' debatable'
betuix the said partiis eftir the tenor of our soueran lordis lettres direct' tharupoun'

The said day comperit Robert guthre of lovnan' and' William
fraser of Durris and Inquerit diligently befor the aldirman
bailyes counsaill and diuers' of the communite and' causit Johne
cuk ane of the officiaris of the said burgh' till Inqueir at
the wyndow of the tolbutht of the samyn gif thar was ony per
soune or personis complantuis' one thame offering thame till
vnderly the law befor the said aldirman and' bailyes furthwith
but ony delatone and' nay persone comperit beand' complan
tuis' apone the said robert and' William' Apone the quhilkis
the said robert and' William askit Instrument of me ser John'
Stirueling Notar publicis befor the witnes mastir Ector brois' John'
colysoun' thomas Waus thomas Wod' bailyes Alexander menyes
Duncan fiff Waltir cullan ser Dauid Waus patry leslie yongar
and' Johnne Cragis

The said day henry symsone' stablar grantit that he come
souerte for freir Johnne lam to Dauid treis for v s' quhilkis
the bailyes chargit him to pay the said Dauid or gar him
be pait within terme of lawe et cetera eftir the tenour of his grant

The said day the alderman and' bailyes ordanit and asignit
the linaris of the said burgh' vnsuspek to pas' this day be tua
eftir none or tharby and lyne Johne' arthouris land' liand' in
the gastraw eftir the deliuerance of the counsaill gevin tharupon
and' the land' of William Wormet beand in the said gait

The said day the bailyes continewit the borgh' fundin one Johnne
auchneiff be Johnne colisoun' for the wranguis' withhaldin
of ane masere to the vij day maij
